channel.title: Req:No more Rapidshare/Megaupload
channel.description: I think there should be a new rule that no megaupload or rapidshare links showed be allowed to be posted apart from the existing ones. Many people cant use either of them so i think there should be a STOP. Also a sticky with some other upload sites should be posted or something, sites like Ihud :)

item.title: Req:No more Rapidshare/Megaupload
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

What he said was, starting a petition, and demanding a new rule are 2 different things. You are doing the later.

EDIT: Yea what Nerice said.

Read full topic

item.title: Req:No more Rapidshare/Megaupload
item.dc:creator: @Nerice Nerice
item.description:
@Nerice wrote:

[quote=“Do0mzy, post:13, topic:8888”][quote author=Sean link=topic=12664.msg142611#msg142611 date=1155241532]
Theres one thing about petinoning about to get a thread about peoples issues with these download services and offer valid replacements. Its another to demand an outright ban on them. Learn the difference.
[/quote]

sorry…what???[/quote]

He is saying its stupid to try to have the links to them banned on this forum because a few people cant use them. (Way I read it anyway, and tend to agree)

Read full topic

item.title: Req:No more Rapidshare/Megaupload
item.dc:creator: @Nerice Nerice
item.description:
@Nerice wrote:

Do0mzy:

Invalid session, Download session inactive, limit exceeded.

You are probably either trying to download mutliple things at once (or on a proxy and someone else on that proxy is) or while its counting down the timer you do something else and it takes you too long to come back after the timer has stopped to click to download it. There is only a certain amount of time you have after the counter finishes to download.

Read full topic

item.title: Req:No more Rapidshare/Megaupload

item.title: Req:No more Rapidshare/Megaupload
item.dc:creator: @Do0mzy Do0mzy
item.description:
@Do0mzy wrote:

Dude, Ihud offers 50mb limit per file. Who the $@%& on this forum needs more than 50mb to upload a file apart from warez??? ;D[br][size=1]Posted at: August 10, 2006, 03:43:08 PM[/size][hr][quote=“daycrawler”]LEts also keep in mind that you sound like a leech. Stfu and upload it yourself then.[/quote]

Oh yeh upload a file i need to download, mind tellin me how that works bud?

Read full topic

item.title: Req:No more Rapidshare/Megaupload
item.dc:creator: @White_Castle White Castle
item.description:
@White_Castle wrote:

Keep in mind that these free upload sites can’t just open their servers to whatever you want to download/upload. They have bandwidth limits/ space limits. So unless you really have a problem with waiting an hour, just ask them to upload at another site. ^

Read full topic

item.title: Req:No more Rapidshare/Megaupload

item.description:
@Big_words wrote:

Why don’t you just ask really nicely if someone can upload it to another site?

[/quote]

Ohh so thats why they cant use rapidshare, cause they didnt configure there enviromental variables. Very sorry!!![/quote]
